analysis: The project currently lacks a Christmas theme and mobile responsiveness. The HTML structure is basic, the CSS does not include festive elements, and the JavaScript does not handle mobile interactions. The existing to-dos focus on navigation and SVG patterns but do not address the Christmas theme or mobile responsiveness.

improvements.description: Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
Implement a Christmas theme with festive colors (red, green, gold), holiday icons, and seasonal decorations.
Add JavaScript functionality to toggle the mobile navigation menu and handle mobile interactions.
